todos.title: Attend standup
todos.description: Give a brief description of what i did yesterday and hoping to do today.

todos.title: Go to gym
todos.description: Concentrate on overall body muscles to avoid one section getting bigger than the other.

todos.title: Daylight savings
todos.description: Check my calendar to ensure that I now know the time for my meetings that was updated due to daylight savings.

todos.title: Spoke interview
todos.description: Don't forget to ask how the team runs in terms of KPIs.

todos.title: Take a walk
todos.description: Pass through road through to buy groceries on way back.
